txt_en: If winter comes, can spring be far behind?
txt_cn: 冬天来了，春天还会远吗？
author: Shelley

txt_en: The worst loneliness is not to be comfortable with yourself.
txt_cn: 最糟糕的孤独是无法舒适地和自己相处。
author: 马克·吐温

txt_en: We have to do the best we are capable of. This is our sacred human responsibility.
txt_cn: 我们必须尽力而为，这是我们生而为人的神圣责任。
author: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦

txt_en: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
txt_cn: 宽恕无法改变过去，却能拓宽未来。
author: Paul Boese

txt_en: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
txt_cn: 我发现，如果你爱生活，生活也会用爱来回报你。
author: Arthur Rubinstein

txt_en: Your children don't need you to be perfect. They just need you to believe in them.
txt_cn: 孩子并不需要你是个完人，只需要你的信任。
author: 《小飞象》

txt_en: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness for it shows me the stars.
txt_cn: 我将热爱光明，因为它为我指明道路，而我将忍受黑暗，因为它向我展示繁星。
author: Og Mandino

txt_en: I'd rather regret the things I've done than regret the things I haven't done.
txt_cn: 我宁愿为自己做过的事后悔，也不愿为自己没做的事遗憾。
author: Lucille Ball

txt_en: The memories we make with our family are everything.
txt_cn: 我们和家人一起创造的记忆最为重要。
author: Candace Cameron Bure

txt_en: New Year is a spring time! Open up like a flower! Let the world see your energy!
txt_cn: 新的一年宛若春天！ 像花儿一样绽放吧！ 让世界看到你的能量！
author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

txt_en: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
txt_cn: 花儿没有阳光便不能绽放，人没有爱便不能生存。
author: Max Müller

txt_en: How many a man has dated a new era in his life from the reading of a book.
txt_cn: 有多少人因为读了一本书而开启了人生的新篇章呀！
author: 亨利·戴维·梭罗

txt_en: Kites rise highest against the wind, not with it.
txt_cn: 风筝逆风才能高飞——而不是顺风。
author: 温斯顿·丘吉尔

txt_en: We are most alive when we're in love.
txt_cn: 沉浸在爱中的生命是最鲜活的。
author: John Updike

txt_en: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
txt_cn: 长得很慢的树，能结出最好的果子。
author: 莫里哀

txt_en: Never assume that you're stuck with the way things are. Life changes, and so can you.
txt_cn: 永远别认为你无法摆脱现状，人生会改变，你也会。
author: Ralph Marston
